title: Hikawa Sensei wa Otaku Kareshi ga Hoshii - Novel Updates
author: Shinomiya Yuu   篠宮 夕
description:
The Forbidden sweetly love comedy of high school students×teacher to connect with Otaku Culture.

“I want a cute and gentle otaku girlfriend.”

Takuya Kirishima an Otaku High School student who embraced a faint desire met his ideal spring break.

“I thought I could talk to you a little bit more.……”

Beautiful Otaku Girl, Mashiro Hikawa!

Our hobbies are very compatible, we get along very well together, and we can feast on Hikawa’s homemade dishes, we have a lot of Otaku dates, and it was sunny and became a lover … However the new semester.

“I became your homeroom teacher…… eh?”

“…… Ha?”

Her true identity was Hikawa-Sensei the “Ice princess” demon teacher of the school!?

The students and teachers are absolutely outrageous!

This is a secret love story between me and Hikawa-Sensei, both of whom were forbidden>
